alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 11:31AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lander County through NOON PDT... At 1131 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 29 miles north of New Pass Summit, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antelope Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
